participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to protect my children from harm.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.
i have a marketing job.
i try to eat healthy or i do not eat at all.
i want to be a music teacher.

participant_2.background:
I go running to stay fit and it helps me clear my mind after a long day at work.
My family is my world and I love to explore new places with them.
I baked a lot of cakes for my family and friends last year.
we live in a rural area.
I created a new car design in my head.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing?
Hi, I am doing great thanks for asking! How are you?
I am doing well! I am recovering from knee surgery and my dog Snowball keeps me company.
Oh no, that sounds painful! I am sorry to hear that. I am glad you have a good companion to help you through it.
Thanks! It is a bit slow going, but I am making progress.
Good to hear! What do you do for work?
I am a marketing manager for a small business.
That sounds interesting! I love marketing.
I do too, but I would like to eventually be a music teacher.
Oh that is awesome! I love music too, I have been playing the piano since I was little.
That's great! What kind of music do you like to play?
I love all kinds of music, but I am mostly into classic rock and country.
Nice! I love classic rock too. I like to listen to music while I run.
That's a great way to get motivated! I love running too, it's a great way to clear my head.
It really is! I love exploring new places while I run.
Me too! I love going on runs with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I am sure your family loves spending time with you.
They do! We are really close.
That's great! I am happy to hear that.
Thanks! I am glad we got to chat today.
Me too! It was nice talking to you
